media:group.media:title: Q&A with A&V Livestream 10/26/22 8:00 PM
media:group.media:description:
Virologists Amy Rosenfeld and Vincent Racaniello answer your questions about viruses - including SARS-CoV-2, monkeypox virus, poliovirus, influenza virus, and more - on this livestream on Wednesday 10/26/22 at 8:00 PM eastern US.

Become a patron of Q&A at microbe.tv/contribute
